title: Foundation: A/Ls and Basic Marketing Knowledge
description: While any A/L stream is acceptable, the Commerce stream can provide a good foundation. Start building your knowledge by following marketing trends and reading basic marketing literature.

title: Professional Qualification / Degree
description: Pursue a recognized professional marketing qualification or a university degree. CIM (UK) is highly regarded in the Sri Lankan corporate sector. A business or marketing degree is also a strong alternative.

title: Marketing Executive / Brand Executive
description: Secure an entry-level position in a marketing department. You will be responsible for executing marketing campaigns, coordinating with agencies, conducting market research, and managing social media channels.
institutes: Leading Advertising Agencies (e.g., Ogilvy, Leo Burnett)

title: Assistant Brand Manager / Brand Manager
description: Move into a brand management role where you take ownership of a specific brand or product portfolio. This involves developing marketing strategies, managing budgets, and analyzing brand performance.
qualifications: Proven experience as a Marketing Executive
institutes: Primarily FMCG, Banking, and Telecommunication sectors

title: Marketing Manager / Head of Marketing
description: As a Marketing Manager, you oversee the entire marketing function of the company or a business unit. You are responsible for setting the overall marketing strategy, leading the team, and driving business growth through marketing initiatives. An MBA can be highly beneficial at this stage.
institutes: Any leading local or multinational corporation in Sri Lanka
